= Upload Sound =

== Actions ==

 * Upload a sound on the server for the specified channel.

== Request ==
<table cellspacing="4" border="0">
 <tr><td>*URL*</td><td>[http://fabienrenaud.com/armp/www/uploadSound.php]</td></tr>
 <tr><td>*Method*</td><td>POST</td></tr>
 <tr><td>*Authentication*</td><td>Required.</td></tr>
</table>

Mandatory parameters:
 * channelId = _int_ > 0
 * sound = _binary data_ The uploaded file.

Optional parameters:
 * name = _string_ The name of the spot.

== Response ==

That WS returns a XML file with the following tree:
 * *root*
  * *message* The url where the picture has been stored.
  * *logged* _See [WS_DefaultResponse Common/Default WS Response]_
  * *status* _See [WS_DefaultResponse Common/Default WS Response]_

==== Sample ====

{{{
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<root>
  <message>snd/sound.wav</message>
  <logged>1</logged>
  <status>1</status>
</root>
}}}
